description:
This month we have a tantalizing trio or terrific tech-talks, three totally transformative tutorials! These three top-speakers will tell us all about ...

**Async method chaining in C#** \- chaining tips for super clear orchestrations\.

**Sustainable Demand Shifting** \- enabling applications to run where and when the carbon intensity is at its lowest

**What’s Coming in C# 12 and Beyond** \- features we can expect with C\# 12 \(due in November\) and preview features that could come after\.

The lovely folks a Clearbank will be hosting us and providing us with refreshments, we've had some great events in their office, it should be awesome!
title: September - .NET South West Meetup Triple-Header
